titleStmt.title: A discourse on the principles of chiromancy by monsieur de la Chambre, counsellor to the king of France in his counsels, and his physitian in ordinary ; Englished by a person of quality.
titleStmt.author: La Chambre, Marin Cureau de, 1594-1669.
